text: The 1927 North Carolina Tar Heels football team represented the University of North Carolina in the 1927 college football season. The Tar Heels defeated Davidson College 27-0, with the first touchdown in Kenan Memorial Stadium. ==Schedule== ==References== North Carolina Tar Heels Category:North Carolina Tar Heels football seasons Tar Heels
title: 1927 North Carolina Tar Heels football team
